description: Reusable types for an at://2048 authority to prove that it has verified a record

verificationRef.description: Holds the signature for another record showing it has verified it to the best of it's ability and it should be trusted if the signatures match.

keyRef.description: The at://uri for the public did:key to verify the remote record. This also counts as the authority of the verification (example @2048.blue). As well as the type of verification by the collection name (blue.2048.key.game).

recordRef.description: The at://uri for the record that is being verified.

signature.description: The public verifiable signature of the record. Serialization of the records valued

subject.description: DID of the subject the verification applies to.
